comments:
Description:
AssertionFailedException is thrown out by following steps.

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a blank library, publish it
2. Add something to the library, save it, republish it

Expected result:
The library can be published

Actual result:
AssertionFailedException is thrown out, can't publish any library until you restart eclipse

Error log:
org.eclipse.jface.util.Assert$AssertionFailedException: Assertion failed: ContentViewer must have a content provider when input is set.

Please try to clear the meta.
We face same problem but resolved by clear the meta.
Even we can't reproduce this, we add some logic to avoid potential problem by reading the stack trace and code review.

traces.message: Assertion failed: ContentViewer must have a content provider when input is set.
